title: System Resource Limits Configuration
description: Shared configuration for system resource limit validation across Python and TypeScript implementations

open_files.warning_template: Open files limit is low ({value}). Recommended: ≥{min}. This may cause issues with HTTP clients (Undici), WASM, and headless browsers.

virtual_memory.warning_template: Virtual memory limit is restricted ({value}). Recommended: {expected}. This may cause runtime OOM errors.

threadpool_size.warning_template: UV_THREADPOOL_SIZE not set or too low ({value}). Recommended: {min} for better fs/crypto/dns performance in Node.js components.

max_processes.warning_template: Max processes limit is low ({value}). Recommended: ≥{min}.
